## BlockNavigationPolicy class

Set of rules controlling keyboard navigation from a block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class BlockNavigationPolicy implements INavigationPolicy<BlockSvg> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFirstChild(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy.getfirstchild.md) |  | Returns the first child of the given block. |
|  [getNextSibling(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy.getnextsibling.md) |  | Returns the next peer node of the given block. |
|  [getParent(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy.getparent.md) |  | Returns the parent of the given block. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy.getprevioussibling.md) |  | Returns the previous peer node of the given block. |
|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy.isapplicable.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.blocknavigationpolicy.isnavigable.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given block can be navigated to. |
